core:FragmentDefinition:
<table:Column autoResizable="true" width="150px" id="<%- ids.column %>" >
<Label id="<%- ids.label %>" text="New Column">
<Text id="<%- ids.text %>" text="Sample data"/>
<core:CustomData key="p13nData" id="<%- ids.customData %>" value='\{"columnKey": "<%- ids.column %>", "columnIndex": "<%- ids.index %>"}' />
